law.text: There is continued within the Public Protection Cabinet a department to be known as the Department of Insurance.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 913, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 29, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 2, sec. 1, effective June 18, 1970.
